notes:
Wood volume of the trunk without bark or branches at least 7 cm in diameter (limit for coarse wool) of all trees and shrubs  starting at 12 cm dbh, based on the stem-form function according to Kaufmann (2001). The definition of the assortment is based on the 2010 edition of the Trading Practices (Handelsgebräuchen Ausgabe 2010).
